alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Madison; Northern Oneida; Otsego; Southern Oneida; Sullivan (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 23 at 8:13PM EST until December 24 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of up to one half inch and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Oneida, Madison, Otsego, Delaware, and Sullivan counties. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Slippery sidewalks, roads and bridges are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Pockets of freezing rain are expected tonight into Sunday morning with light ice accumulations possible. This may result in slippery road conditions and sidewalks.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Delaware; Madison; Northern Oneida; Otsego; Southern Oneida; Sullivan
